history.proof: qauto use: minus_zero_r, plus_reg_r, plus_opp_l, plus_assoc, plus_zero_l, plus_comm, opp_zero unfold: minus.

exceptions.tactic: intros T U F G HF D f g Heq Hfilter.
intros T U F G' HF D f g Heq Hfilter.
apply filterlim_ext with (within D F) f.
exceptions.exn: The reference F was not found in the current environment.
The reference Heq was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hfilter was not found in the current environment.

original: intros T U F G HF D f g Heq Hfilter. apply filterlim_ext with (within D F) f. - intros x. apply Heq. - apply Hfilter.
